description_for_human: Ask your source code directly. The intelligent rubber ducky! - This plugin enables ChatGPT to work with software projects that are larger than its context window. Forget about copy-pasting code.
description_for_model: This tool organizes a software project and its associated documentation, providing search and summary functions. It facilitates a progressive understanding of the project by retrieving fragments of code and documentation, thereby creating a context for reasoning about specific tasks.
